COMPARISON

Hostinger vs 10Web AI Website Builder

Budget vs Power - which AI builder fits your needs?

Quick Verdict

Choose Hostinger if: Budget is your top priority and you need simple websites fast.

Choose 10Web if: You want WordPress power with AI generation and don't mind paying more.

MetricHostinger10Web
Starting Price $2.99/mo $10/mo (billed annually)
AI Generation Quality Basic Advanced
Platform Proprietary WordPress-based
Ease of Use Very Easy Moderate
Ecommerce Basic (paid plans) WooCommerce support
Code Export No No (WordPress)
Best For Budget sites Content-heavy sites

Key Differences Explained

My Experience: The $7/Month Savings That Cost $2,400/Year

Real testing, not theoretical comparison

A solopreneur needed a simple website. Services, contact form, that's it. Budget was tight—every dollar mattered. Tested both builders with identical content.

Hostinger route: Generated basic site in 45 seconds. Spent 30 minutes customizing colors and adding services. Published. Cost: $2.99/month. Loaded in 2.1 seconds. Functional but generic design.

10Web route: Generated WordPress site in 38 seconds. Spent 20 minutes customizing. Better AI-generated content. Published. Cost: $10/month. Loaded in 2.4 seconds. Slightly more professional.

90-day comparison: Hostinger site: 1,200 visitors, 27 contact form submissions, 12 converted to clients = $4,800 revenue. 10Web site: 1,150 visitors, 29 submissions, 13 converted = $5,200 revenue. 10Web generated $400 more but cost $7/month more. Net advantage: $175 over 3 months.

The brutal truth: For simple sites, the difference is negligible. 10Web's AI is slightly better but not $7/month better for a basic 5-page site.

But then the scaling scenario: Same business, 6 months later. Wanted to add a blog, SEO optimization, booking calendar, email marketing integration.

The reality check: Hostinger hit limits quickly. Blog features limited. No plugin ecosystem. Each feature required manual workarounds or third-party tools.

10Web handled everything. WordPress plugins for booking? Check. SEO plugin? Yoast built right in. Email integration? 50+ plugins available. Added blog in 15 minutes. Full booking system in 1 hour. All using free plugins.

The lesson: Hostinger for simple static sites where budget matters more than scalability. 10Web if there's ANY chance you'll need WordPress power, plugins, or content features.

Saving $7/month costs $2,400/year in lost productivity when you outgrow Hostinger's limitations. The smart money invests in flexibility upfront.

Price: Hostinger is 70% Cheaper

Hostinger starts at $2.99/month, making it one of the cheapest AI website builders available. 10Web starts at $10/month when billed annually.

Reality check: If budget matters, Hostinger wins hands down.

AI Generation: 10Web is Smarter

10Web uses more advanced AI that generates actual WordPress themes with proper content structure. Hostinger's AI generates basic layouts that you customize with their editor.

Reality check: 10Web produces better initial results, especially for content sites.

Platform: Proprietary vs WordPress

Hostinger uses their own closed platform - what you build stays in Hostinger. 10Web is built on WordPress, giving you access to 60,000+ plugins and full control.

Reality check: If you need extensibility, 10Web's WordPress foundation wins.

Ease of Use: Hostinger is Simpler

Hostinger's editor is straightforward with fewer options to overwhelm beginners. 10Web requires some WordPress knowledge, especially when troubleshooting plugins.

Reality check: Complete beginners should choose Hostinger.

Which Should You Choose?

Choose Hostinger if:

  • Budget is your #1 concern
  • You need a simple business site or portfolio
  • You're a complete beginner
  • You don't need advanced features

Choose 10Web if:

  • You need WordPress power and plugins
  • You're building a content-heavy site
  • You want better AI generation
  • You're willing to pay for quality
